name: Paint with Dice
description:
"Paint With Dice" is a game where you roll a rainbow-coloured dice around the world and paint designs on paper. There are 6 puzzles, in which you have to strategically roll your dice to paint the designated design. This game is a lot harder than it seems.

CONTROLS

Move - WASD

Restart - R

Reveal Hidden Faces - Space

Back to Menu - Escape
